Uses of Interface
org.js4ms.net.udp.UdpEndpoint

Packages that use UdpEndpoint
org.js4ms.net.udp Provides interfaces and classes used to send and receive UDP datagrams. 
 

Uses of UdpEndpoint in org.js4ms.net.udp
 

Classes in org.js4ms.net.udp that implement UdpEndpoint
 class UdpSocketEndpoint
          A UdpEndpoint implementation that uses a DatagramChannel to provide transport.
 

Fields in org.js4ms.net.udp declared as UdpEndpoint
protected  UdpEndpoint UdpInputChannel.endpoint
           
 

Constructors in org.js4ms.net.udp with parameters of type UdpEndpoint
UdpDatagramPayloadSource(UdpEndpoint udpEndpoint, OutputChannel<ByteBuffer> outputChannel)
          Constructs a packet source that will receive UDP datagrams from a UDP endpoint and send them to an OutputChannel.
UdpDatagramSource(UdpEndpoint udpEndpoint, OutputChannel<UdpDatagram> outputChannel)
          Constructs a UDP datagram source that will receive datagrams from a UDP endpoint and send them to an OutputChannel.
UdpInputChannel(UdpEndpoint endpoint)
          Constructs a UDP output channel bound the the specified endpoint.
UdpOutputChannel(UdpEndpoint endpoint)
          Constructs a UDP input channel bound the the specified endpoint.
